about_the_game:
FEATURES AND GAMEPLAY

Explore the rooms, investigate and find the hidden exit and continue your way to the "End".

You will be alone to untangle and solve the problems that tie you to the place. If you want to reach the end, read the message carefully and think carefully so as not to waste time.

Key Features: Sounds easy, but it just looks.



You don't remember anything, you don't know where you are, you walk and run tirelessly in search of an answer.

There is nobody.

You notice the silence and emptiness around you, this is unsettling.

Do you know where this will take you?



ABOUT THE DEVELOPMENT OF THIS GAME:

This is just the beginning of the story/plot and will serve as an introduction. It will also serve to raise funds to help with the production of upcoming series, titles and sequels.

This game in question will be remade in the future, if the project is successful (it will probably be free).

There will be 5 more parts:

Part 1 - Work in progress
Part 2 - Coming soon
Part 3 - Coming soon
Part 4 - Coming soon
Part 5 - Coming soon

Ratings and genres are subject to change.

Parts will be longer and have larger plots, including this one in question. Don't expect a short, easy game in the upcoming sequels/series.

Sorry for the simplicity. Thank you for your support and for believing in the project!

name: First Report: Unreal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 @ 3.3GHz (4th Generation) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 TI or AMD Radeon R7 370, with a minimum of 3GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You will have to investigate and find the exits while you are in the company of silence and emptiness. Will you be able to stay calm even when there are more questions than answers? Will you make it to the end? Good luck!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Arabic, Indonesian
